about_the_game:
Gameplay & story:
Playing as Dreamy you are the child of the Ancient Dragon of Dreams summoned to the mortal plain, at a loss of memory, you try to find out more about yourself and who you are all while making friends along the way and journeying to confront and defeat the Nightmare terror plaguing the lands of the valley to save the dragon clans. He has to overcome obstacles, mazes, puzzles and gather the dream shards in order to set the balance right again and choose what
to do with the Nightmare in the end, he can get rid of it permanently, return it to normal or embrace it.



There are over 20 playable characters to add into your party however only 4 can be active in battles at a time. Some battles will require strategy/planning or solving a puzzle to get an ability to help win the battle. Spells can be learned, crafted and upgraded or forgotten through the use of trainers.



Key features:
-6 Dragon clans each with a key animal feature representing themselves.
-26 acts and 8 Dream sequence acts
-Many different areas and maps to explore along the journey
-Custom art assets and style
-Custom music assets in certain areas
-Crafting equipment and healing items from collected materials.
-Discover which pathway to take either to save, vanquish or embrace the Nightmare Dragon
-Discover the lore behind the Rakitorvian Dragons culture and beliefs
-Upgradable spells
-Removeable spells
-Battles
-Puzzles
-Mazes
